# The `LeaderMap` Class Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

## Description {#details}

A mapping from value numbers to lists of Value&#42;&#39;s that have that value number.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> findLeader to query it.

Definition at line 243 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/scalar/gvn-h">GVN.h</a>.
